data.title: Coming to Randwick
data.meta_description: Learn about a map, directions on getting to Sydney Children's Hospital, Randwick and information on parking options.
data.text:
Parking

Patients and visitors

the car park is privately operated by Point Parking and is open 24 hours

enter via the Easy Street roundabout on Barker Street, Randwick

take the lifts at the back of the car park to level 0

enter the main doors of Prince of Wales Campus Centre

signs will direct you through to Sydney Children’s Hospital, Randwick

disabled parking spaces are found on level B1 of the car park, in front of the lifts

please note access to the car park has a two metre height restriction.

A five day consecutive visitor pass is available for purchase. Parking rates are subject to change, please confirm prices with Point Parking on (02) 9326 7233.

Parking concession eligibility

Concession rates are now available at Point Parking station for eligible patients and their carers. You are eligible for a concession if you are:

an ongoing cancer patient

patient or carer who is required to attend the hospital for a course of treatment lasting more than one week

patient or carer attending more than twice a week (this includes carers of long-term patients who visit frequently)

outpatient attending daily for treatment

health promotion education class attendee

patient or carer experiencing financial hardship

a holder of a Service NSW issued Disabled Parking Permit, Blue Pension Card, Gold Veterans Affairs Card, Maroon and Yellow Health Care Card, Blue Carer Allowance Health Care Card

a Centrelink beneficiary who qualifies for a Pensioner Concession Card or a Health Care Card

For more information and to claim your concession rate, speak to the Clinical Support Administrator within your ward or clinic who will provide you with a form to complete.

Concession rates and how to apply

Concession rates:

0 to 3 hours: free

3+ hours: $6.50 (one exit only per 24 hours)

3 day ticket: $13.00 (Frequent use allowing multiple entries and exits in a consecutive 3 day period)

7 day ticket: $26.10 (Frequent use allowing multiple entries and exits in a consecutive 7 day period

How to apply for concessions:

Speak with the Clinical Support Administrator within your ward or clinic.

You will be provided with a form to complete prior to validation.

Take this form to the Information Desk, Prince of Wales Hospital (Barker St entrance) for validation prior to exit.

Take your validated ticket to the Point Parking ticket machine to pay for your concession rate.

If you are applying to receive the 3 day or 7 day consecutive ticket:

Speak with the Clinical Support Administrator within your ward or clinic.

You will be provided with a form to complete prior to validation.

Take this form to the Barker Street Prince of Wales information desk to validate the pass. If outside hours 8am – 8pm please take to Point Parking Station office on Level B1.

Visitor and patient parking

The car park is open 24 hours a day, 365 days of the year.

Entry to the car park is via the Easy Street roundabout on Barker Street, Randwick.

Once you have parked your car, take the lifts located at the back of the car park to Level 0.

Enter the main doors of Prince of Wales Campus Centre, then follow the signs to Sydney Children's Hospital, Randwick.

The car park is managed by Point Parking. For more information, please call (02) 9326 7233.

Parking rates (effective 1 July 2018) are as follows:

5 to 30 minutes: $5.80

30 to 60 minutes: $11.60

1 to 1.5 hours: $17.40

1.5 to 2 hours: $23.20

2 to 2.5 hours $29.00

2.5 to 3 hours $35.00

$35.00 maximum daily charge

Lost ticket $35.00

For up-to-date prices, please visit: https://pointparking.com.au/locations/prince-of-wales-hospital

Restricted parking

Parking spaces with the signage 'PERMIT HOLDERS ONLY' are restricted to STAFF permit holders ONLY.
